summary: During a suicide attack on an airport, the hand grenade of 'M', one of three terrorists, malfunctions and he is captured. Exposed to maltreatment in prison he slowly loses his grip on ... See full summary »
cast: Tomorô Taguchi|Panta|Taka Ôkubo|Jôji Kajiwara|Keiko Oginome|Arata Iura|Shoichi Honda|Hiroshi Yamamoto|Tokio Emoto|Manami Higa|Genpei Akasegawa|Yutokutaishi Akiyama|Mike Arnold|Hotaru Hazuki|Yutaka Hiramatsu|Masaaki Hiraoka|Kiyomi Itô|Yoshihiro Katô|Katsuya Kobayashi|Masao Matsuda|Toshiyuki Matsushima|Yôko Nagisa|Shigeru Nakano|Jim O'Rourke|Nao Okabe|Shô Ryûzanji|Ryosuke Uryu|Kôji Wakamatsu|Inuhiko Yomota|Takahisa Zeze
title: Yûheisha - terorisuto
